data: PED Newborn Neonatal Opioid Withdrawal Syndrome (NOWS) - Pharmacological Therapy (Multiphase)
Refer to Treatment Algorithm for the Newborn Exposed to Substance(s) in Pregnancy
Refer to Neonatal Opioid Withdrawal Syndrome (NOWS) Algorithm
As per Eat Sleep Console Care Tool
q4h, prior to morphine dosing if applicable
In case of severe withdrawal, consider escalation to Step 2 prior to 24 hours
0.04 mg/kg, PO, q4h, PRN other (see comment), drug form: oral liq
Discontinue PRN morphine after 24 hours without a dose being administered
Discontinue Step 1 phase of PED Newborn Neonatal Opioid Withdrawal Syndrome (NOWS) - Pharmacological Therapy (Multiphase) PowerPlan
Ensure Step 1 phase of PED Newborn Neonatal Opioid Withdrawal Syndrome (NOWS) - Pharmacological Therapy (Multiphase) PowerPlan has been discontinued
Refer to Treatment Algorithm for the Newborn Exposed to Substance(s) in Pregnancy

As per Eat Sleep Console Care Tool
q4h, prior to morphine dosing if applicable
PRN only dosing (Step One) should be trialed prior to initiation of a routine dose
Select morphine q4h regular AND q4h PRN
0.04 mg/kg, PO, q4h, drug form: oral liq
0.02 mg/kg, PO, q4h, PRN other (see comment), drug form: oral liq
Discontinue Step 2 phase of PED Newborn Neonatal Opioid Withdrawal Syndrome (NOWS) - Pharmacological Therapy (Multiphase) PowerPlan
